channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Will Create New Winners and Losers in Healthcare
item.description: Market reactions sharply diverged among healthcare companies as investors expect changes to Obamacare and Medicare.

item.title: Speed of Trump Policy Plans Will Steer Dollar Rally
item.description: The U.S. dollar is off to a strong start under President-Elect Donald Trump, but the path forward from here will greatly depend on the pace of policy ...

item.title: Dow Jumps About 1400 Points, Bonds Tumble on Trump Win
item.description: The Dow industrials surged to their biggest gain in two years, with the dollar and bitcoin also posting sharp climbs.

item.title: Toyota posts nearly 20% drop in second-quarter operating profit, missing estimates
item.description: Despite the lower takings, Toyota had raised its interim and full year dividend forecast

item.title: CVS posts mixed results, holds off on guidance in Joyner's first earnings report as CEO
item.description: CVS expects elevated medical costs to continue to pressure its performance this year, "and as a result we are not providing a formal outlook at this t...

item.title: Novo Nordisk shares jump 8% after Wegovy sales beat expectations
item.description: Novo Nordisk on Wednesday reported third quarter earnings broadly in line with expectations and narrowed its 2024 full-year growth guidance.

item.title: Super Micro shares plummet 22% after financial update heightens investor concerns
item.description: Super Micro's stock fell to its lowest since mid-2023 on Wednesday after the company issued unaudited quarterly results that added to investor concern...

item.title: British fintech firm Wise posts 55% jump in profit on expanding market share
item.description: British digital payments firm Wise said that its first-half profit totalled Â£217.3 million ($279.8 million) in the first-half period, up 55% year-over...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled nearly 2.7% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 4.4%, down five of the past six sessions.

item.title: Dow Surges, Bonds Tumble After Trump Is Elected President
item.description: U.S. stock indexes jumped as the Dow industrials gained more than 3%. Investors are piling into trades that align with a second Trump presidency.
